member.name: KERB_ADD_CREDENTIALS_REQUEST_EX
member.summary: Specifies a message to add, remove, or replace an extra server credential for a logon session, and the service principal names (SPNs) to be associated with that credential. The SeTcbPrivilege constant is required to alter another logon account's credentials.

member.name: KERB_ADD_CREDENTIALS_REQUEST_EX.Credentials
member.summary: A structure that specifies the credentials to add, remove, or replace.

member.name: KERB_ADD_CREDENTIALS_REQUEST_EX.PrincipalNameCount
member.summary: The number of elements in the PrincipalNames array.

member.name: KERB_ADD_CREDENTIALS_REQUEST_EX.PrincipalNames
member.summary: An array of SPNs to be associated with the user account specified by the Credentials member
